test_cases.title: Successful Email Registration
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register using a valid email and strong password.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives a confirmation email and account is created.

test_cases.title: Registration with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when an invalid email format is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for invalid email format.

test_cases.title: Registration with Weak Password
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when a weak password is entered.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for weak password.

test_cases.title: Registration with Already Registered Email
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when using an email that is already registered.
test_steps: Enter an already registered email address
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating email is already registered.

test_cases.title: Registration with Missing Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that registration fails when required fields are missing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for missing required fields.

test_cases.title: Successful Social Media Registration
test_cases.description: Verify that a new user can register using Google account.
test_cases.expected_results: User account is created and user is logged in.

test_cases.title: Social Media Registration Authentication Failure
test_cases.description: Verify that user is notified if social media authentication fails.
test_steps: Attempt to authenticate with invalid Google credentials
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message indicating authentication failure.

test_cases.title: Link Multiple Social Media Accounts
test_cases.description: Verify that user can link multiple social media accounts to their profile.
preconditions: User is registered and logged in
User has Google and Facebook accounts
test_cases.expected_results: Both social media accounts are linked to the user profile.

test_cases.title: Successful User Login
test_cases.description: Verify that a registered user can log in using valid credentials.
test_steps: Enter registered email and correct password
test_cases.expected_results: User is logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

test_cases.title: Login with Incorrect Credentials
test_cases.description: Verify that the system notifies the user when incorrect credentials are entered.
test_steps: Enter registered email and incorrect password
test_cases.expected_results: System displays an error message for incorrect credentials.

test_cases.title: Forgot Password Link Access
test_cases.description: Verify that the user can access the 'Forgot Password' feature.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays password reset request form.

test_cases.title: Login Session Persistence
test_cases.description: Verify that login session persists until user logs out or session expires.
test_cases.expected_results: User remains logged in if session is active.

test_cases.title: Request Password Reset
test_cases.description: Verify that user can request a password reset link via email.
test_cases.expected_results: System sends a secure reset link to the registered email.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Invalid Email
test_cases.description: Verify that password reset fails for unregistered email.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error message for unregistered email.

test_cases.title: Set New Password via Reset Link
test_cases.description: Verify that user can set a new password using the reset link.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_cases.expected_results: Password is updated and user is notified of successful reset.

test_cases.title: Password Reset with Weak New Password
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates new password strength during reset.
preconditions: User has received password reset email
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for weak password.

test_cases.title: View Profile Information
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view profile information including name, email, and profile picture.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile information is displayed correctly.

test_cases.title: Edit and Save Profile Changes
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit and save changes to profile fields.
test_cases.expected_results: Profile is updated and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Profile Update with Invalid DATF
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates updated information before saving.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for invalid dATF.

test_cases.title: Immediate Reflection of Profile Changes
test_cases.description: Verify that profile changes are reflected immediately after saving.
test_cases.expected_results: Updated information is displayed instantly.

test_cases.title: Change Password from Profile
test_cases.description: Verify that user can change password from profile settings.
test_cases.expected_results: Password is changed and confirmation is displayed.

test_cases.title: Change Password with Incorrect Current Password
test_cases.description: Verify that password change fails if current password is incorrect.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for incorrect current password.

test_cases.title: Change Password with Weak New Password
test_cases.description: Verify that system checks new password strength during password change.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for weak password.

test_cases.title: Logout Other Sessions after Password Change
test_cases.description: Verify that user is logged out from other sessions after password change.
preconditions: User is logged in on multiple devices
test_steps: Change password from profile on one device
Attempt to access account from another device
test_cases.expected_results: User is logged out from other sessions.

test_cases.title: Browse Product CATFlog
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view a list of products with images and basic details.
test_cases.expected_results: Product list with images and details is displayed.

test_cases.title: Product CATFlog Category Filter
test_cases.description: Verify that products are organized by categories and filters.
preconditions: Products are available in multiple categories
test_cases.expected_results: Only products from selected category are displayed.

test_cases.title: Product CATFlog Search
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for products by name or keyword.
test_steps: Enter product name or keyword in search bar
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant products are displayed based on search term.

test_cases.title: Real-time CATFlog Update
test_cases.description: Verify that cATFlog updates in real-time as new products are added.
test_cases.expected_results: New product appears in cATFlog instantly.

test_cases.title: View Product Details
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view detailed information about a product.
test_cases.expected_results: Product details including images, description, price, and specifications are displayed.

test_cases.title: View Product Reviews and Ratings
test_cases.description: Verify that user can see product reviews and ratings.
test_cases.expected_results: Product reviews and ratings are displayed.

test_cases.title: View Stock Availability
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view stock availability for a product.
test_cases.expected_results: Stock availability is displayed.

test_cases.title: Related Products Suggestion
test_cases.description: Verify that related products are suggested on the product details page.
test_cases.expected_results: Related products are displayed as suggestions.

test_cases.title: Add Product to Cart from CATFlog
test_cases.description: Verify that user can add products to cart from cATFlog page.
test_steps: Click 'Add to Cart' on a product
test_cases.expected_results: Product is added to cart and cart quantity/total price is updated.

test_cases.title: Add Product to Cart from Details Page
test_cases.description: Verify that user can add product to cart from product details page.
test_cases.expected_results: Product is added to cart and cart quantity/total price is updated.

test_cases.title: Add Out of Stock Product to Cart
test_cases.description: Verify that user is notified when trying to add out of stock product to cart.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays notification that product is out of stock.

test_cases.title: Cart Persistence Across Sessions
test_cases.description: Verify that cart persists across sessions until checkout or removal.
preconditions: User has added products to cart
test_cases.expected_results: Cart contents remain unchanged.

test_cases.title: Update Cart Quantity
test_cases.description: Verify that user can increase or decrease product quantity in cart.
test_cases.expected_results: System recalculates total price and updates cart immediately.

test_cases.title: Update Cart Quantity Beyond Stock
test_cases.description: Verify that user is notified if requested quantity exceeds stock.
test_steps: Attempt to increase quantity beyond available stock
test_cases.expected_results: System displays notification that quantity exceeds stock.

test_cases.title: Remove Item from Cart
test_cases.description: Verify that user can remove items from cart.
test_cases.expected_results: Product is removed from cart and total price is updated.

test_cases.title: Checkout with Valid Information
test_cases.description: Verify that user can complete checkout with valid shipping, billing, and payment information.
test_steps: Enter valid shipping and billing information
test_cases.expected_results: Order is placed and user receives confirmation.

test_cases.title: Checkout with Missing Required Fields
test_cases.description: Verify that checkout fails if required fields are missing.
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for missing required fields.

test_cases.title: Order Summary Display Before Confirmation
test_cases.description: Verify that order summary is displayed before confirmation.
test_cases.expected_results: Order summary with products, quantities, prices, and totals is displayed.

test_cases.title: View Order History
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view a list of previous orders with details.
test_cases.expected_results: List of previous orders with details is displayed.

test_cases.title: Order Status Display
test_cases.description: Verify that order status is displayed for each order.
test_cases.expected_results: Order status (e.g., processing, shipped) is displayed for each order.

test_cases.title: Reorder Items from Past Orders
test_cases.description: Verify that user can reorder items from past orders.
test_cases.expected_results: Items are added to cart for reorder.

test_cases.title: Filter Orders by Date
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter orders by date.
test_cases.expected_results: Orders within selected date range are displayed.

test_cases.title: Submit Product Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can submit a review and rating for purchased products.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is submitted and displayed on product details page.

test_cases.title: Submit Review for Unpurchased Product
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates user has purchased product before allowing review.
test_cases.expected_results: System prevents review submission and displays error.

test_cases.title: Edit Product Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can edit their own review.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is updated and changes are displayed.

test_cases.title: Delete Product Review
test_cases.description: Verify that user can delete their own review.
test_cases.expected_results: Review is removed from product details page.

test_cases.title: Add Product to Wishlist
test_cases.description: Verify that user can add products to wishlist from cATFlog.
test_steps: Click 'Add to Wishlist' on a product
test_cases.expected_results: Product is added to wishlist.

test_cases.title: View and Manage Wishlist Items
test_cases.description: Verify that user can view and manage wishlist items.
test_cases.expected_results: Wishlist items are displayed and can be managed.

test_cases.title: Move Item from Wishlist to Cart
test_cases.description: Verify that user can move items from wishlist to cart.
test_cases.expected_results: Item is removed from wishlist and added to cart.

test_cases.title: Wishlist Persistence Across Sessions
test_cases.description: Verify that wishlist persists across user sessions.
test_cases.expected_results: Wishlist items remain unchanged.

test_cases.title: Admin Add New Product
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can create new product entries with all required details.
test_cases.expected_results: Product is added to cATFlog and visible to users.

test_cases.title: Admin Edit Product Information
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can edit existing product information.
test_cases.expected_results: Product information is updated and reflected in cATFlog.

test_cases.title: Admin Remove Product from CATFlog
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can remove products from cATFlog.
test_cases.expected_results: Product is removed from cATFlog and no longer visible to users.

test_cases.title: Admin Product DATF Validation
test_cases.description: Verify that system validates product dATF before saving.
test_steps: Attempt to add product with missing required fields
test_cases.expected_results: System displays error for missing required fields.

test_cases.title: Admin View All Orders
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view all orders with details.
test_cases.expected_results: All orders with details are displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Update Order Status
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can update order status.
test_cases.expected_results: Order status is updated and visible to user.

test_cases.title: Order Status Change Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that system logs changes to order status.
test_cases.expected_results: Order status change is recorded in system logs.

test_cases.title: Admin Filter Orders by Status
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can filter orders by status.
test_cases.expected_results: Only orders with selected status are displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin View All User Accounts
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can view all user accounts.
test_cases.expected_results: All user accounts are displayed.

test_cases.title: Admin Deactivate User Account
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can deactivate a user account.
test_cases.expected_results: User account is deactivated and user cannot log in.

test_cases.title: Admin Reset User Password
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can reset a user's password.
test_cases.expected_results: User receives password reset email.

test_cases.title: Admin Action Logging
test_cases.description: Verify that system logs all admin actions on user accounts.
test_steps: Perform actions on user accounts (deactivate, reset password)
test_cases.expected_results: All admin actions are recorded in system logs.

test_cases.title: Admin Filter Users by Status
test_cases.description: Verify that admin can filter users by status.
preconditions: User accounts exist with different statuses
test_cases.expected_results: Only users with selected status are displayed.

test_cases.title: Order Confirmation Email Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives email confirmation upon order placement.
test_cases.expected_results: Order confirmation email with order details is received.

test_cases.title: Order Status Update Email Notification
test_cases.description: Verify that user receives email updates for order status changes.
test_cases.expected_results: Email notification with updated order status is received.

test_cases.title: Opt Out of Email Notifications
test_cases.description: Verify that user can opt out of email notifications.
test_cases.expected_results: No email notifications are received for order updates.

test_cases.title: Search Products by Name
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for products by name.
test_steps: Enter product name in search bar
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant products matching the name are displayed.

test_cases.title: Search Products by Category
test_cases.description: Verify that user can filter search results by category.
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant products in selected category are displayed.

test_cases.title: Search Products by Keyword
test_cases.description: Verify that user can search for products by keyword.
test_cases.expected_results: Relevant products matching the keyword are displayed.

test_cases.title: Search Result Sorting by Relevance
test_cases.description: Verify that search results are sorted by relevance.
test_cases.expected_results: Search results are sorted by relevance.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Mobile
test_cases.description: Verify that platform layout adapts to mobile screen size.
preconditions: User accesses platform on mobile device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adapts and all features are accessible on mobile.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Tablet
test_cases.description: Verify that platform layout adapts to tablet screen size.
preconditions: User accesses platform on tablet device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adapts and all features are accessible on tablet.

test_cases.title: Responsive Design on Desktop
test_cases.description: Verify that platform layout adapts to desktop screen size.
preconditions: User accesses platform on desktop device
test_cases.expected_results: Layout adapts and all features are accessible on desktop.

test_cases.title: Image and Text Scaling
test_cases.description: Verify that images and text scale appropriately on different devices.
preconditions: User accesses platform on mobile, tablet, and desktop
test_cases.expected_results: Images and text scale appropriately on all devices.

test_cases.title: Navigation Usability Across Devices
test_cases.description: Verify that navigation remains user-friendly on mobile, tablet, and desktop.
preconditions: User accesses platform on various devices
test_steps: Navigate through main menu and pages
test_cases.expected_results: Navigation is user-friendly and consistent across devices.

summary: 79 comprehensive test cases have been generated covering positive, negative, boundary, and edge scenarios for all 20 user stories, ensuring thorough functional and non-functional coverage of user registration, login, password management, profile management, product cATFlog, cart, checkout, order history, reviews, wishlist, admin features, notifications, search, and responsive design.
